snippet: The European Union threatened Russia with new trade sanctions if Moscow fails to start reversing its action in Ukraine, but sharp divisions among leaders at a summit in Brussels left the timing of any measures uncertain....

headline.print_headline: EU Wields Russia Sanctions Threat but Timing Vague
headline.main: EU Wields Russia Sanctions Threat but Timing Vague

lead_paragraph: The European Union threatened Russia with new trade sanctions if Moscow fails to start reversing its action in Ukraine, but sharp divisions among leaders at a summit in Brussels left the timing of any measures uncertain.
